issue.title: Python: Change pyarrow.Table.dataframe_from_batches API to create Table instead
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-409](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-409). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed in PR https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/216 the pyarrow.Table API to convert RecordBatches to pandas.DataFrame would be better/more flexible as follows:

```
table = pa.Table.from_batches(batches)
df = table.to_pandas()
```
